mapper.insert: insert into t_wms_outbounddetail (ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, OBID, STORAGECONTANTID, PLANQUANTITY, QUANTITY, UNIT, REMARK, SKUID, SKUNAME) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{obid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storagecontantid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{planquantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skuname,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_wms_outbounddetail set GMTCREATE = #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GMTMODIFIED = #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ISDELETED = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NAMECREATE = #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAMEMODIFIED = #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBID = #{obid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STORAGECONTANTID = #{storagecontantid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PLANQUANTITY = #{planquantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUANTITY = #{quantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SKUID = #{skuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SKUNAME = #{skuname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, OBID, STORAGECONTANTID, PLANQUANTITY, QUANTITY, UNIT, REMARK, SKUID, SKUNAME from t_wms_outbounddetail where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, OBID, STORAGECONTANTID, PLANQUANTITY, QUANTITY, UNIT, REMARK, SKUID, SKUNAME from t_wms_outbounddetail
